document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I've </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seen </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Eye </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Run </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">round </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">round </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Room </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">search </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Something </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seemed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Cloudier </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">become </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">obscure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Fog </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">soldered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">disclosing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Twere </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">blessed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seen </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I've seen a dying eye
